Title: The Cat and the Canary
Writer: John Willard (from the stage play by), Robert F. Hill (adaptation), Alfred A. Cohn (adaptation), Alfred A. Cohn (scenario), Walter Anthony (titles), Edward J. Montagne (story supervision)
Actors: Laura La Plante, Creighton Hale, Forrest Stanley, Tully Marshall
Plot: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.
